attributes.action: Offer more protection to private tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Private landlords greed and irresponsibility is leading to a whole generation of people who dont have the security of enjoying the home they live in. The current letting framework in this country is no longer fit for purpose and is contributing towards an expolitative system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
